name: Swat Team Shootout
description: Urban terrorists are wreaking havoc on the town, recklessly robbing banks and taking civilians hostage. the chief of police has decided that enough is enough, and it's time to call in the swat team for some professional back up. as the ranking officer of your squad, it's up to you to put the terrorists down before they take any more lives. ready your aim and rain fire on these terrible foes to earn points. you'll earn bonus points for head shots, so practice your sharp shooting skills to regain control of your city and rack up a high score. use your cash to upgrade your weaponry and dispatch numerous enemies with ease in this fun online shooting game for kids!
